name: Switchick
description:
Switchick

Is a game where you are a little chick trying to nap in it's little egg, but you've been woken up, and you'll need to find another egg to nap in. However in trying to journey to get back to sleep, you'll discover powers you didn't know you had. //

  • A & D  or <- & -> - For Moving..!
  • Space - to Jump..!
  • E - to Switch the ground between the two sides of the map..! //

This game is a submission for the 3rd BenBonk Game Jam..! //

The Team ;-

Coder / Level Designer / GlerG

Pixel Artist / Digital Arist / Taha

Composer / SFX Designer / Curruff

//
